what: Summarize West Coast Fishery Data to Support Stock Assessments
title: Summarize West Coast Fishery Data to Support Stock Assessments
text: package contains code process data PacFIN, RecFIN, SWFSC-CPFV Cooperative Collections, NWFSC WCGBT survey, NWFSC HKL survey, CCFRP. Summaries available data provided inform future assessment types (benchmark, update, data-moderate).

title: Summarize West Coast Fishery Data to Support Stock Assessments

code: process_comps_unexpanded(   dir = NULL,   datL,   lgthBins = 1,   sex = lifecycle::deprecated(),   partition = 0,   fleet = "Enter Fleet",   ageErr = "NA",   agelow = -1,   agehigh = -1,   month = "Enter Month",   two_sex_model = TRUE,   printfolder = "forSS",   verbose = TRUE )

title: Creates a matrix of length or age composition data WITHOUT expansion — process_comps_unexpanded
text: dir directory output files saved datL read length comps PullBio.fn function lgthBins vector length bins age bins group data Stock Synthsis sex Deprecated nwfscSurvey 2.2.1 (February 2023). function now output female/male unsexed compositions present data frame datL partition partition Stock Synthesis fleet fleet number ageErr Number ageing error matrix Stock Synthesis agelow age bin Stock Synthesis (default value -1) agehigh age bin Stock Synthesis (default value -1) month month samples collected used Stock Synthesis determine length/age estimate compare . two_sex_model Default TRUE. TRUE unsexed composition data present unsexed comps output format needed two-sex model Stock Synthesis. printfolder folder length comps saved verbose logical value specifying whether print message statements screen using function. default print messages, .e., verbose = TRUE.

title: Creates a matrix of length or age composition data WITHOUT expansion — process_comps_unexpanded

what: Wrapper function to pull all species catch and biological data from the NWFSC data wharehouse. — pull_wcgbts
title: Wrapper function to pull all species catch and biological data from the NWFSC data wharehouse. — pull_wcgbts
text: Wrapper function pull species catch biological data NWFSC data wharehouse.

title: Wrapper function to pull all species catch and biological data from the NWFSC data wharehouse. — pull_wcgbts
code: pull_wcgbts(   dir = here::here("data-raw"),   species,   survey = "NWFSC.Combo",   load = FALSE,   convert = TRUE,   verbose = FALSE )

title: Wrapper function to pull all species catch and biological data from the NWFSC data wharehouse. — pull_wcgbts
text: dir Directory location save cleaned data frame species list species names created get_species_list function survey character entry one following options specifies survey pull data : Triennial, AFSC.Slope, NWFSC.Combo, NWFSC.Slope, NWFSC.Shelf load Option load existing Rdata files catch biological data. convert logical whether convert data column names old names currently used nwfscSurvey processing code verbose logical value specifying whether print message statements screen using function. default print messages, .e., verbose = TRUE.

title: Wrapper function to pull all species catch and biological data from the NWFSC data wharehouse. — pull_wcgbts
